name: GBDK2020
description: This extension provides a task setup for cleaning, building, and running a GBDK 2020 project. Requires gbdk2020.json file in the the root of the project directory, a GBDK2020 template project with a Makefile, and the run command requires that the OS can launch files with the extension defined in the "gbdk2020-run-platform" field (e.g. "gb").
